Scott and I worked on a project in VERY short order to take an ISO9001 QMS to ISO13485 in only a few months time.  Not only was the upgrade done on time, with minimal non-conformances but he helped to elevate ALL areas of the QMS to a world class standard in parallel.  He worked tirelessly and without complaint to provide our organization an incredible improvement in process effectiveness but also focused on efficiency.  Thanks Scott.  Keep up the great work!

Global Engineering Manager, Ultrasound Probes at GE Healthcare
April 23, 2008, Scott was a client of Scott’s

I highly recommend Scott Pletzer to anyone that needs Quality System related support. Scott has been helping PADT Medical for the past year. He has essentially developed our entire quality system from scratch to a point where our system is now FDA Compliant. Scott did a masterful job learning our business and tailoring the quality system to meet our specific needs. He trained our staff and continues to help us improve our system as we grow and learn.  Scott is knowledgeable, efficient, and responsive. He is a pleasure to work with and always willing to help.  We are fortunate to have Scott as part of our Quality Control team. I highly recommend Scott Pletzer to anyone that needs Quality System related support.

summary: Versatile quality professional adept with broad technical aspects of Quality System Regulations (QSR), ISO 9001/13485, and European Medical Device Directive (MDD) requirements related to the development, scale-up, commercialization, and maintenance of medical devices. Twenty years of hands-on experience with quality systems, internal & external process-based audits, CAPA and nonconformance systems, equipment & process validation (IQ, OQ, and PQ), design controls (including ISO 14971), test method development, capability assessment, document control systems, FMEAs, failure investigations, statistical analysis, supplier auditing, and complaint handling. Strong oral and written communication skills, excellent interpersonal and management skills, and an intuitive ability to manage multiple assignments while optimizing time management.
name: Scott Pletzer
title: Sr. Manager Quality & Regulatory Compliance at Philips
